aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.content: Hello! That guy up there is me :). Well, my name is Vinicius and I am a "program boy" since 2019, but all my interested in this beautiful work area comes since I'm young, when I had my own Minecraft server, all begins with me just editing some YAML files, but with time I got limited in terms of the functionality to my server, then after a little google time I found a plugin called "Skript" that lets me create mini plugins to my server, the logical structure of it was pretty similar to Python's, but after a while the same problem comes to me, Skript it was really good, but again I got limited with the functionalities, then I decided to learn Java and started to do my own plugin and that's when I fell in love with language and with development.

buckbeakweb.title: Buckbeak Web
buckbeakweb.content: This project was created with intention to use as a potfolio for me, in this project I'm using the React library with Typescript and to the language switcher I'm using i18next library.
buckbeakweb.moreinfo: More informations in the links bellow

naginiapi.title: Nagini Api
naginiapi.content: This project was created with the intention of simulating a real e-commerce API scenario, it was used the teconology Golang with the framework Fiber and to save datas, it was used the MySQL.
